author: crossley
msg: Test using SVN/CVS Keywords such as Revision and Date.

author: chathura_ce
msg: Session affinity load balance endpoint should build the envelope in the first request of the session. So that it can resend the message, if the selected endpoint has failed.

author: chathura_ce
msg: Added HTTP cookie based session dispatcher. Now Loadbalance endpoints can track HTTP sessions.
Improved the failure handling of endpoints. Duration to suspend an leaf level endpoint after a failure can be set using <suspendDurationOnFailure> element.
Parent endpoints determine whether they have failed or not by examine the status of their child endpoints.
Resolved some concurrency issues in endpoints.

author: sandakith
msg: clean the ant build, related to Axis2 2072
